member.name: T:Sxta.Rti1516.DynamicCompiler.DynamicCompiler
member.summary: The dynamic proxy compiler. May be invoked as a command line application or by using the static CompileProxies method (from within an NAnt task, for instance).
member.author: Agustin Santos.

member.name: F:Sxta.Rti1516.DynamicCompiler.DynamicCompiler.log
member.summary:
Define a static logger variable so that it references the Logger instance.
NOTE that using System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod().DeclaringType is equivalent to typeof(LoggingExample) but is more portable i.e. you can copy the code directly into another class without needing to edit the code.

member.name: M:Sxta.Rti1516.DynamicCompiler.DynamicCompiler.CompileProxies
member.summary: Compile native source code for a set of proxy classes corresponding to the object and classSerializerHelperName classes described in the federation description document. Any existing files will be overwritten.

member.name: M:Sxta.Rti1516.DynamicCompiler.DynamicCompiler.GenerateCodeForProxies(System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: Generates native source code for a set of proxy classes corresponding to the object and classSerializerHelperName classes described in the federation description document. Any existing files will be overwritten.
